original: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke ekavīsa pe avigate ekūnatisa
